name: Hollow Radiance
simpleDescription: Immobilize enemies to gain a shield. Activate to run faster at opponents.

passives.name: Immolate
passives.effects: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 15 (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage magic damage every second to enemies within icononly=true 325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, with the damage being increased by 25% against minions and monsters. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage.

passives.name: Desolate
passives.effects: Killing a non-champion unit causes an eruption around their death location that deals {{|ap}} ({{|#var:hollow_ibase}})*2}} (+ {{ap|{{|#var:hollow_ihp}}*2}}% bonus health) magic damage magic damage|200% of Immolate's damage}}to enemies within 350 units. Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them causes a larger eruption that deals {{|ap}} ({{|#var:hollow_ibase}})*4}} (+ {{ap|{{|#var:hollow_ihp}}*4}}% bonus health) magic damage magic damage|400% of Immolate's damage}}to enemies within 500 units.
